message: Accept this offer and we can end the game early!
Take it or leave it, I'm not budging!
Meet me in the middle, let's end this!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
Don't be greedy, let's split it fairly!
You're getting closer to nothing, I'm getting closer to everything!
Last chance, let's make a deal!
You're running out of time, I'm running out of patience!
Last chance, take it or leave it!
You're really running out of options now!
Take it, it's the best I can do!
It's now or never, Alice! Take it or get nothing!
